acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should return valid class info for POJOs with no attributes
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldReturnAValidClassInfoForPojoWithNoAttributes

test-step.description: Given a ClassInfo for class <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmptyTestPojo with empty attributes
When I invoke Podam Utils method to get class info for class class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmptyTestPojo and approver
Then the two objects uk.co.jemos.podam.api.ClassInfo@68d21915 and uk.co.jemos.podam.api.ClassInfo@68d21915 should be equal
